trends: There has been one other sighting in Harrison Township
There were no other sightings in Harrison Township on or around September 3rd 2008
Summary: had 4 like wings colored with another light right in front of it
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my porch and i always watch the sky over the river there were a lot of planes flying when one passed near this light i noticed it didnt look like a plane it looked like it had 4 wings of different color with a smaller light right in front of it it went across the sky not real fast it went from the east towards the west i watched it for a minute or so then lost sight of it my neighbor was out and seen the same thing we both agreed that it wasnt like anything weve ever seen
